title: A1502 Logic board problem
message:
Hi, i have a laptop on service A1502 model board is 820-3476-A, problem is after playing video notebook power off, or restart. sometime after power on, going only fan and cpu heating,   please help me where is the problem.  is problem with cpu ?  
Thank you.

title: A1502 Logic board problem
message:
Available history, when this starts?
Any sign of liquid spill?
Clean the board and change thermal paste.
Run 3S162 EFI ASD and see if any error pops out.
